publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4244.1 Richard Baker: Cashback for Communities: Investing the Proceeds of Crime Back Into Our Communitiesâ€”As an amendment to motion (S3M-4244) in the name of Kenny MacAskill, insert at end "; believes that every effort should be made to ensure further progress in recovering assets from those who profit from crime, and believes that funds obtained through the Proceeds of Crime Act 2002 should continue to be focussed on projects in communities affected by crime and in activities that provide diversion from offending."
